definition: head of provincial PRC government department
(jocularly) to sleep on the couch/to sleep in the living room

sentences.english: Liu Yaohua was relieved from the post as Chief of the Bureau of Public Security of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 免去柳耀華新疆維吾爾自治區公安廳廳長職務。

sentences.english: Speech by Mr. Jim Cheng, Secretary of Commerce and Trade of State of Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 維吉尼亞州商務貿易廳廳長鄭叔霆致辭祝賀。

sentences.english: Which does the present Hebei Province assistant head of public security office have?
sentences.chinese: 現任河北省公安廳副廳長有哪幾位？

sentences.english: Recently, the provincial health department deputy director Liao Xinbo rate experts went to consultation.
sentences.chinese: 近日，省衛生廳副廳長廖新波率專家親赴會診。

sentences.english: Liu Jilei was appointed Vice Director of Science and Technology Department of Hebei province.
sentences.chinese: 任命劉紀雷爲河北省科學技術廳副廳長。

sentences.english: Nathan Rees, the NSW premier, said the government should lead by example.
sentences.chinese: 水務廳廳長李斯說“政府將帶頭執行做出榜樣。”

sentences.english: Jiangsu Provincial Construction Department dispatched the first done reporting.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇省建設廳廳長周遊首先做了彙報。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
matters relating to the Chinese diaspora (as a concern of the Chinese government)

Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (abbr. for 中央人民政府駐香港特別行政區聯絡辦公室|中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室[Zhong1 yang1 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 fu3 Zhu4 Xiang1 gang3 Te4 bie2 Xing2 zheng4 qu1 Lian2 luo4 Ban4 gong1 shi4]) or the equivalent office in Macao
